mapper.update:
update t_contract_info
CONTRACT_NAME = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_KEY = #{contractKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OSS_KEY = #{ossKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_contract_info set CONTRACT_NAME = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_KEY = #{contractKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OSS_KEY = #{ossKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from T_CONTRACT_TEMPLATE_REF_CONTRACT a left join t_contract_info b on a.CONTRACT_ID = b.id where a.TPL_ID = #{templateId}
and b.ENABLED = true
